00048 void PrimitiveCreator::createCuboid(const Vertex& position, const Vertex& angles, const Vertex& dimension)
00049 {
00050         m_primitive = new Assembly(wxT("noname"));
00051 
00052         //set it to atomic, is smallest part i'll produce
00053         m_primitive->setType(IS_ATOMIC);
00054 
00055         // set position of the cuboid
00056         m_primitive->setCuboid(position.getX(),position.getY(),position.getZ(),dimension.getX(),dimension.getY(),dimension.getZ());
00057 
00058         // set rotation of the cuboid
00059         m_primitive->setPhi(angles.getX());
00060         m_primitive->setTheta(angles.getY());
00061         m_primitive->setRho(angles.getZ());
00062 
00063         // prepare points
00064         float x = dimension.getX() / 2.0;
00065         float y = dimension.getY() / 2.0;
00066         float z = dimension.getZ() / 2.0;
00067 
00068         // create front face
00069         Vertex topLeft(-x, y, z);
00070         Vertex bottomLeft(-x, -y, z);
00071         Vertex bottomRight(x, -y, z);
00072         Vertex topRight(x, y, z);
00073         Vertex normal(0, 0, 1);
00074         m_primitive->addFace(*createFace(topLeft, bottomLeft, bottomRight, topRight, normal));
00075 
00076         // create right face
00077         topLeft.setXYZ(x, y, z);
00078         bottomLeft.setXYZ(x, -y, z);
00079         bottomRight.setXYZ(x, -y, -z);
00080         topRight.setXYZ(x, y, -z);
00081         normal.setXYZ(1, 0, 0);
00082         m_primitive->addFace(*createFace(topLeft, bottomLeft, bottomRight, topRight, normal));
00083 
00084         // create back face
00085         topLeft.setXYZ(x, y, -z);
00086         bottomLeft.setXYZ(x, -y, -z);
00087         bottomRight.setXYZ(-x, -y, -z);
00088         topRight.setXYZ(-x, y, -z);
00089         normal.setXYZ(0, 0, -1);
00090         m_primitive->addFace(*createFace(topLeft, bottomLeft, bottomRight, topRight, normal));
00091 
00092         // create left face
00093         topLeft.setXYZ(-x, y, -z);
00094         bottomLeft.setXYZ(-x, -y, -z);
00095         bottomRight.setXYZ(-x, -y, z);
00096         topRight.setXYZ(-x, y, z);
00097         normal.setXYZ(-1, 0, 0);
00098         m_primitive->addFace(*createFace(topLeft, bottomLeft, bottomRight, topRight, normal));
00099 
00100         // create upper face
00101         topLeft.setXYZ(-x, y, -z);
00102         bottomLeft.setXYZ(-x, y, z);
00103         bottomRight.setXYZ(x, y, z);
00104         topRight.setXYZ(x, y, -z);
00105         normal.setXYZ(0, 1, 0);
00106         m_primitive->addFace(*createFace(topLeft, bottomLeft, bottomRight, topRight, normal));
00107 
00108         // create bottom face
00109         bottomLeft.setXYZ(-x, -y, -z);
00110         topLeft.setXYZ(-x, -y, z);
00111         topRight.setXYZ(x, -y, z);
00112         bottomRight.setXYZ(x, -y, -z);
00113 
00114         normal.setXYZ(0, -1, 0);
00115         m_primitive->addFace(*createFace(topLeft, bottomLeft, bottomRight, topRight, normal));
00116 }

00118 void PrimitiveCreator::setMaterial(Assembly* parent, const string& name)
00119 {
00120         //tell the parent what color his child has got
00121         parent->setChildMaterial(m_primitive, m_matlib.getMaterial(name));
00122 }

00132 Face* PrimitiveCreator::createFace(Vertex& topLeft, Vertex& bottomLeft, Vertex& bottomRight,
00133         Vertex& topRight, Vertex& normale)
00134 {
00135 
00136         Face* face = new Face();
00137 
00138         Vertex* vector = new Vertex(topLeft);
00139         Vertex* normal = new Vertex(normale);
00140         TCoord* tcoord = new TCoord(0, 1);
00141         VNT vnt(vector, normal ,tcoord);
00142         face->addVNT(vnt);
00143 
00144         vector = new Vertex(bottomLeft);
00145         normal = new Vertex(normale);
00146         tcoord = new TCoord(0, 0);
00147         VNT vnt2(vector, normal, tcoord);
00148         face->addVNT(vnt2);
00149 
00150         vector = new Vertex(bottomRight);
00151         normal = new Vertex(normale);
00152         tcoord = new TCoord(1, 0);
00153         VNT vnt3(vector, normal,tcoord);
00154         face->addVNT(vnt3);
00155 
00156         vector = new Vertex(topRight);
00157         normal = new Vertex(normale);
00158         tcoord = new TCoord(1, 1);
00159         VNT vnt4(vector, normal, tcoord);
00160         face->addVNT(vnt4);
00161 
00162         return face;
00163 }
